description:
A lightweight version of their best-selling Nuuk Parka, made for milder conditions. Its long, generous cut reaches down over the rear and thighs making it the perfect choice for damp and cold autumn days; it is waterproof, windproof and breathable so will protect against the wind and rain and the synthetic padding keeps the warmth in even in damp conditions.

Drawcord at the waist and protective hood with detachable faux fur edging. Plenty of pockets for essential items including warm hand pockets at chest height. Two-way zipper with protective flap featuring press buttons sewn into webbing to make any repairs needed easy to carry out. Recycled polyamide shell and polyester padding.
name: Fjallraven Nuuk Lite Parka - Mens
